TopicTitle: How do I upload screenshots to my forum post? from my ksp screenshot folder?

Articles.Content:
Go to imgur and upload the pictures you want from your screenshot file. Then, once the pictures are uploaded, at the right, you should see a bunch of links. Right-click on this one:

Then copy it directly and paste it here and you should get your picture.

Edit: There was a question just like this that was answered! It is right below this one.

Well, you can use almost any image sharing host. I personally use Puush, since it lets me do an instant screenshot and upload with one keyboard command. It doesn't work in fullscreen for KSP however, so it does have its limitations.

Go to imgur and upload the pictures you want from your screenshot file. Then, once the pictures are uploaded, at the right, you should see a bunch of links. Right-click on this one:

Then copy it directly and paste it here and you should get your picture.

Edit: There was a question just like this that was answered! It is right below this one.

I wanna know what this picture was...it's been removed

you can of course use pretty much any hosting service you want that will allow direct linking to content (rather than force you to link to a page full of advertising that contains the image as well).

For example I use the several GB of server space my ISP provides me as part of my contract with them.

I wanna know what this picture was...it's been removed

It's still there. You just have to type it in correctly.

It's still there. You just have to type it in correctly.
